i18n.title: Extra Datas
desc: You can download the 'Extra Datas' you want.
Then open LF2:Wemake and drag the 'Extra Datas'
onto the Entry Page or the Main Page.
After loading, you'll be able to play the content in 'Extra Datas' ğŸ˜€
> 'Extra Data' is basically a Zip file. Don't need to unzip it after downloading from here.
For how to use the 'Extra Datas', please look at the video below.
<video width='320' src='https://lf.gim.ink/docs/video/download_and_use_extra_data.mp4' controls></video>
If you want to use your own characters, weapons, backgrounds, or even stages in LF2:Wemake,
you can check out this ['Conversion Tool'](/tools).
But I'm unable to support AI scripts at present ğŸ¤¦.
Support for AI script functionality may be added in future updates,
and such AI scripts will likely need to be written in TypeScript/JavaScript instead of ActionScript.
